body.name: POMORON MJ005H Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Air Quality Sensors PM2.5 Readings H13 True HEPA Air Purifiers Filter 99.97% of Pollen Dust Smoke Pet Dander Air Cleaner for Bedroom Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 43 mins
features: Air Quality Sensor & Smart Auto Mode: Equipped with a PM2.5 sensor, our MJ005H air purifier can monitor the real-time air quality and display precise PM2.5 readings. In Auto Mode, it can adjust its operation speeds according to the air quality. When the air quality drops, the indicator light will turn yellow or red and the fan will automatically speed up to clean the air faster, creating a healthy living environment for you and your family.

H13 True HEPA Air Filter: Our air purifier features a 3-layer HEPA filter including a pre-filter, an H13 true HEPA filter, and an activated carbon filter. This system effectively captures 99.97% of airborne particles as small as 0.3 microns such as fine fibers, pollen, dust, pet dander, odors and more, enhancing your indoor air quality.

UV-C Dual Purification: Our air purifier for large room has a built-in UV module (special light source, eliminating the need for tube replacement), which further purify the air. Enjoy a clean and refreshing aroma environment while simultaneously enhancing overall air quality.

High Efficiency Filtration: Our HEPA air purifier for home significantly improves purification speed. With high efficiency, the air cleaner can clean large rooms that up to 1076 sq ft. Additionally, the air purifier has different setting, including timer within 24 hours, 3 level fan speed and filter cartridge replacement reminder. It is an ideal companion for homes and offices.

Enjoy Silent Sleep: With a 30dB ultra-quiet sleep mode, our air purifier is a perfect sleep partner. During sleep mode, the air purifier will operate at lowest speed, and the display lights will automatically turn off. It will not disturb your sweet dream, allowing you enjoy the quiet and restful sleep throughout the night and providing you with clean and fresh air when you wake up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, easy setup, 7' cord
reviews.reviewText: For placement purposes, the cord is about 7' long, which will make its way to most locations desired. It's a quiet unit, though I like white noise and prefer the higher speeds. It's super easy to set up and operate, just remove the bag from the filter it ships with and replace the filter, done. There is no remote control, but it does have some features for a timer, and the display can be completely shut off so the blue hue doesn't disturb you. Otherwise, it acts as a low-level night light and I do not find it disruptive.Overall, this unit works well. If you remove the filter cover while it is running, it powers off for safety. This is good for anyone with "little fingers" that may come along.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars POMORON MJ005H Air Purifiers for 1076 sq.ft Home with Air Quality Sensors PM2.5 Reading
reviews.reviewText: It is a good looking unit with air quality PM2.5 display.It is claimed to be for 1076 sq.ft home but as you can see in the picture, it is much smaller than my HOMVANA that is rated for 1096Sq.ft, especially the filter size. POMORON is priced at $119, HOMVANA is $109, so for $10 less you get a bigger unit with the bigger filter area but POMORON has UV cleaner.The noise is about the same as my HOMVANA unit.The power consumption:Low fan speed: 8WHigh fan speed: 22WAuto fan speed: 2WI will have to run this unit for a while to see how well it works compared to my HOMVANA unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact size
reviews.reviewText: I really like the size and shape of this air purifier. It is not overbearing so it does not need to become the focal point of the room. It is efficient and easy to operate. It has a nice display so it is easy to read the air quality level. You can also set the purifier to automatic so it is effortless to maintain good air quality. It is rated for around 1,000 sq ft which is surprising given its smaller stature. I use it in my home office where my three dogs always stay nearby me when I am working and I like knowing that is working on controlling the doggy particles/dander that gather specifically in that room. It is a good value and the product performance is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Just got this air purifier and so far very happy with it. It was easy to set up and is very quiet. Will report back if there are any issues.

reviews.reviewerName: The Tipsy Candle The Tipsy Candle
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Home purifier
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was shocked at how easy this is to put together. Basically, it already came put together with the small exception that you must remove the HEPA filter and remove the plastic bag that it comes in and then snap it back into the filter and power up. It is so quiet I barely noticed that it’s running, it has several different settings including an auto settings. What I like about that auto setting is sometimes we don’t know if an area in our home is not the best air quality. This makes it simple it does it for you and much to my surprise, parts of my home did not have the cleanest air, and then the setting allows itself to filter at the highest Possible filter setting, and will auto adjust itself as the air gets cleaner. I’ve never owned a personal air purifier, but this is probably my new favorite thing as far as HomeGoods. It’s also very quiet you can’t hear it and at night if you like white noise, you can also turn it on a medium setting, and it will provide great white noise for a cleaner and more Comfortable sleep
